My Favourite Apps:

  • Blinkist - Reading & listening 4,500+ bestselling nonfiction books & popular podcasts.
  • Be Focused - Focus Timer - A pomodoro App that helps get things done by breaking up individual tasks among discrete intervals, separated by short breaks.
  • Microsoft To Do - Stay organized and manage your day-to-day with Microsoft To Do.
  • Duolingo - Learn Languages Free

My Favourite Learning Portal

  • EdX
  • Udacity
  • Udemy
  • FreeCodeCamp
